content: The FC Dallas-St. Louis City match on Saturday in Frisco, Texas, was postponed due to inclement weather after a roughly 90-minute delay that began five minutes into the second half.

The match was scoreless at the time of the delay and will be resumed at a later date. It was the first-ever match between the two teams.St. Louis had taken nine shots and put one on goal. Dallas had five shots and two on the mark when play was halted.--Field Level Media
